meanings.definition: Attendings: plural form of attending, meaning those who are present or in attendance
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the attendings shared their thoughts on the project.
meanings.sent2: The attendings at the conference listened attentively to the speaker.
meanings.sent3: The attendings at the party were the first to hit the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The attendings in the audience nodded in agreement with the speaker.
meanings.sent5: The hospital's attendings always provide valuable insights during rounds.

meanings.definition: Attendings: present participial form of attend, meaning to be present at an event or gathering
meanings.sent1: She enjoys attending concerts and music festivals.
meanings.sent2: We will be attending the wedding ceremony next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat surprised us by attending the family dinner.
meanings.sent4: The stars attending the award show shone brightly on the red carpet.
meanings.sent5: He was attending the important business meeting when the phone rang.
